name: Easley's Fun Shop of Horror
description:
An old Fun Shop created by a Magician has been possessed by grotesque Magic. Locked in on Halloween Night, can you escape?

There are two levels in this build of the game. Currently I am designing and creating the rest of the levels for Episode 1.

The controls are: 
WASD - Move Easley's Gal
Left Mouse Button - Shoots equipped weapon
Right Mouse Button - Throws out spirit catcher

To change weapons, press the 1-3 keys when you’ve picked up another weapon.

When you destroy an enemy, the possessed spirit leaves the costume and you need to throw out your spirit catcher to capture the spirit.
If you don't capture the spirit, it will repossess another costume and you'll have to destroy it again.


See if you can escape the labyrinth that Easley's Fun Shop has become.
